title: Russian soldier to go on trial in first war-crimes case - The Associated Press
content: Russian soldier to go on trial in first war-crimes case  The Associated PressView Full Coverage on Google News
description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) â€” A Russian soldier went on trial in Ukraine on Friday for the killing of an unarmed civilian, marking the first time a member of the Russian military has been prosecuted for a war crime during the 11-week conflict .
